name: Celestial Expedition
description:
Appreciate yourself and the empty sea of stars...

Welcome to a thrilling adventure designed for the Mindwave hardware! While you don't necessarily need to own this device to play the game, we highly recommend it for the ultimate experience of using your brain to collect stars. Get ready to embark on an exciting journey like no other, where your mind is your greatest tool and the stars are yours to claim.

Controls:

W,A,S,D / Controller stick -> Movement 

Pickup -> if you own the headset you need to focus on the stars to pick them up, if you dont, you just need to get close enough to collect them

I -> toggles information about current hardware values
